list_definition.mean_english: sự che chở, sự ẩn náu
list_definition.definition: protection against wind, rain, enemies etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We gave the old man shelter for the night.

list_definition.definition: a building etc designed to give such protection
to be in, or go into, a place of shelter

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: That line of trees shelters my garden.
